name: Npoly Printed Container (Tr Pink) 15 ltr
description:
Printed Container….  This Product is made up of the strongest, most durable plastic and can last for many years if properly cared for. The design of this product is unique and exceptional. It will increase the decorative smartness of your room. And yet, its finish makes its beautiful look hard to scratch or stain. You’ll be pleasantly surprised by the durability and stability of this product.
